pageContent: Purpose: To investigate the treatment outcomes of a single-session high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) using the Sonablate(®) for patients with localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
The Role of Percentage of Prostate-specific Antigen Reduction After Focal Therapy Using High-intensity Focused Ultrasound for Primary Localised Prostate Cancer. Results from a Large Multi-institutional Series
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32444261/
